thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 26 of 97
thread.title: Antoinette

author: Antoinette
title: Antoinette
text: I have really enjoyed Biblio since I discovered it. I love holding a real book in my hands. They have had every title I have searched for and it's great to find just the book you're looking for. If I put a keyword in the search engine that interests me, I then find gems I never heard of. I have found the vast majority of booksellers to be honest about the condition of the book. The prices are fantastic even for new/fine books if you search for the bargains.
